title: Draft an Answer to a Complaint
description: A client has been sued, and a litigation associate needs to draft an answer to the complaint.

tasks.description: Review the filed complaint, addressing each numbered paragraph.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reads and understands all allegations.

tasks.description: For each allegation, draft a response: admitting, denying, or stating a lack of knowledge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a response to every paragraph in the complaint.

tasks.description: Draft any applicable affirmative defenses (e.g., statute of limitations, failure to state a claim).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent includes a list of potential defenses.
